entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, June 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, June 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Two days ago we uploaded new Photos to 4 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1991-0901 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 1 high resolution and 6 medium resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1991.
(ii) 1992-0719 Guru Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1992.
(iii) 1993-1112 Diwālī Pūjā: 4 medium resolutions uploaded, link Russia 1993.
(iv) 1996-0505 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link Collection 1996.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 16
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 extra Photos from the special event 1981-0929 Navarātri Pūjā, New York City, NY, U.S.A., the first high resolutions of the first Pūjā in the U.S.A., have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the just started Named Collection.
The direct link to all 5 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1981.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 2

link.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 2

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention 2 new galleries Publications-Offerings, India Tours by a photographer, Puja Cards, and Gifts and Offerings.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, May 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, May 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to mention that we are beginning to report monthly on Pūjās for which Photos have been priorly uploaded but new Photos are uploaded. Very often, new uploads change the sequences, but this will not be mentioned again.
Today we have uploaded new Photos to 4 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1975-0000 Small Pūjā: 1 low resolution uploaded, link India 1975.
(ii) 1987-1016 Śhrī Mahākālī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Germany 1987.
(iii) 1988-0710 Śhrī Haṃsa Chakra Swāminī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Germany 1988.
(iv) 1991-0325 Śhrī Rāma Pūjā: 5 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1991.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 15
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 35 Photos from the special event 1990-0409 Press Conference, Kolkata, India, the only Press Conference in West Bengal in the database, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 35 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to all 35 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1990.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 14
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 5 Photos from the special events during the 1976-0900 Visit, Mainland China, i.e., from the very first visit to Mainland China, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 high resolutions and 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections. Few of the events during this visit might have taken place at the end of August, however, it has been felt, exceptionally, more desirable, based on multiple CCT database considerations, to have only 0900 mentioned in the titles of the Photos.
[Note 1: 2 high resolutions were uploaded only on 2023-0518.]
[Note 2: 2 high resolutions and 1 low resolution were retitled as 1984-1000 on 2023-0519.]
The direct link to all 8 Photos in the smallest gallery: China 1976.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

Few of the events during this visit might have taken place at the end of August, however, it has been felt, exceptionally, more desirable, based on multiple CCT database considerations, to have only 0900 mentioned in the titles of the Photos. [Note 1: 2 high resolutions were uploaded only on 2023-0518.] [Note 2: 2 high resolutions and 1 low resolution were retitled as 1984-1000 on 2023-0519.] The direct link to all 8 Photos in the smallest gallery: China 1976. entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 11
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 7 Photos of the event 1973-0715 Guru Pūjā, Mumbai, India, as of today the first Pūjā with an audio tape, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 7 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
Direct link to all 7 Photos in the smallest gallery: 1973 Collection.
[Note: 2 Photos were uploaded only on 2023-0513.]
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
